ema pakshaye paramarthaya wuye yatath wijitha wadayen purna deshapalana nidahasa saha samaja sadharanaya athi kirimaya. 1950 di pawathwana lada komiyunist pakshaye 4 wani sammelana warayedi, kamkaru panthiya, duppath gowi janathawa, madhyama panthiya ha buddhimathungeda, adhirajyawadayata prathigami thaththwayata wiruddhawa satan karana jathika balawegawala pulul jathika peramunak pilibanda deshapalana sankalpaya idiripath karana laddeda dosthara wikramasinhayanya.1930 gananwala kisiwekuge awadhanaya lamayin kerehi yomu nowu awadhiyaka lamayin wenuwen handa nangu wikramasinha mahatha awurudu 14ta adu daruwan gruhastha sewaye yedawima sampurnayenma thahanam kirima , mahajana subasadhaka anshayak pihituwima, lama subasadhanaya pilibanda gatalu soya balimata samaja sewakayan path kirima, asarana lamayin sandaha jathika lama niwasa yojana kramayak athi kirima, angawikala daruwan rajaye wiyadamen nadaththu kirima aadi karunu rasak sandaha awashya katayuthu itu kala pulul dakmak athi deshapalanagnyaya wuyeya.siyaluma kamkaruwanta ha sewakayanta awama watup, paya ataka wada dinayak athulu kamkaru samithi sandaha prajathanthrawadi ayithiwasikam sahathika kirima, siyaluma denata rakiyawak ho jiwathwime margayak surakshitha kirima ha wayasa 18 tharunayinta chanda ayithiya laba diya yuthuya yanna mulinma yojana kale ohuya.*
